results.title: The role of sodium lauryl sulfate on formulation of directly compressed tablets containing simvastatin and aspirin: Effect on drugs dissolution and gastric mucosa
results.text_hl: The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ alone exhibited a gastroprotective effect on the induced @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@irritation@@@.

citations.NLM: Alshora DH, Ibrahim MA, Zayed G, Al Rwashed MA, Abou-Taleb HA, Ali MF. The role of sodium lauryl sulfate on formulation of directly compressed tablets containing simvastatin and aspirin: Effect on drugs dissolution and gastric mucosa Saudi Pharm J. 2022 May;30(5):635-645. PMID: 35693440

results.title: Simvastatin attenuated sickness behavior and fever in a murine model of endotoxemia.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@sickness behavior@@@ and @DISEASE_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ model of @DISEASE_Endotoxemia @DISEASE_MESH:D019446 @@@endotoxemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Oliveira MK, Dos Santos RS, Cabral LDM, Vilela FC, Giusti-Paiva A. Simvastatin attenuated sickness behavior and fever in a murine model of endotoxemia. Life Sci. 2020 Aug 1;254():117701. PMID: 32387414

results.title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Statins:A Descriptive Analysis of Psychiatric Adverse Reactions in EudraVigilance
results.text_hl: From January 2004 to July 2021, a total of 8965 ADRs were reported for the Systems Organ Class (SOC) "@<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric disorders@@@", of which 88.64% were registered for @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ (3659), @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (2326) and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ (1962).

citations.NLM: Pop G, Farcaș A, Butucă A, Morgovan C, Arseniu AM, Pumnea M, Teodoru M, Gligor FG. Post-Marketing Surveillance of Statins:A Descriptive Analysis of Psychiatric Adverse Reactions in EudraVigilance Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2022 Dec 10;15(12):. PMID: 36558987
citations.BibTeX: @article{36558987, title={Post-Marketing Surveillance of Statins:A Descriptive Analysis of Psychiatric Adverse Reactions in EudraVigilance}, author={Pop G and Farcaș A and Butucă A and Morgovan C and Arseniu AM and Pumnea M and Teodoru M and Gligor FG}, journal={Pharmaceuticals (Basel)}, volume={15}, number={12}}

results.title: First documented case of Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: The infant was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, which improved his @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@irritability@@@ and was well tolerated.

citations.NLM: Aladia AH, Hamdan S, Alkheder A. First documented case of Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with simvastatin. Oxf Med Case Reports. 2024 Nov;2024(11):omae129. PMID: 39575090

results.title: Simvastatin Improves Behavioral Disorders and Hippocampal Inflammatory Reaction by NMDA-Mediated Anti-inflammatory Function in MPTP-Treated Mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Improves @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@Behavioral Disorders@@@ and Hippocampal @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@Inflammatory@@@ Reaction by @CHEMICAL_N_Methylaspartate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016202 @@@NMDA@@@-Mediated Anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ Function in @CHEMICAL_1_Methyl_4_phenyl_1_2_3_6_tetrahydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015632 @@@MPTP@@@-Treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@.

results.title: Elevated cerebrospinal fluid glial fibrillary acidic protein levels in Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome.
results.text_hl: Relative to an age-appropriate comparison group, we found that CSF @GENE_GFAP @GENE_2670 @@@GFAP@@@ levels were elevated 3.9-fold in @DISEASE_Smith_Lemli_Opitz_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D019082 @@@SLOS@@@ (3980 +- 3732 versus 1010 +- 577 pg/ml, p = 0.0184). @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@, a @GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase@@@ inhibitor, has previously been shown to increase expression of hypomorphic @GENE_DHCR7 @GENE_1717 @@@DHCR7@@@ alleles and in a placebo-controlled trial improved serum @CHEMICAL_Sterols @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013261 @@@sterol@@@ levels and decreased @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@irritability@@@.

citations.NLM: Luke RA, Cawley NX, Rahhal S, Selvaraman A, Thurm A, Wassif CA, Porter FD. Elevated cerebrospinal fluid glial fibrillary acidic protein levels in Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome. Mol Genet Metab. 2024 Aug 30;143(1-2):108570. PMID: 39244853
citations.BibTeX: @article{39244853, title={Elevated cerebrospinal fluid glial fibrillary acidic protein levels in Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome.}, author={Luke RA and Cawley NX and Rahhal S and Selvaraman A and Thurm A and Wassif CA and Porter FD}, journal={Mol Genet Metab}, volume={143}, number={1-2}, pages={108570}}

results.title: Simvastatin enhances immune responses to Abeta vaccination and attenuates vaccination-induced behavioral alterations.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ enhances immune responses to @GENE_APP @GENE_11820 @@@Abeta@@@ vaccination and attenuates vaccination-induced @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@behavioral alterations@@@.

citations.NLM: Kou J, Kim HD, Jin J, Cao D, Li L, Lalonde R, Fukuchi K. Simvastatin enhances immune responses to Abeta vaccination and attenuates vaccination-induced behavioral alterations. Brain Res. 2010 Oct 14;1356():102-11. PMID: 20691674

results.title: Mood, Personality, and Behavior Changes During Treatment with Statins: A Case Series
results.text_hl: Case	Case history	 	1	Case 1, a professionala male in his 40s with a history of @DISEASE_Psoriasis @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ and two negative stress SPECT tests, with no personal or family history of @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@psychiatric illness@@@, was placed on @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 80 mg for @DISEASE_Hyperlipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D006949 @@@hyperlipidemia@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Technetium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013667 @@@TC@@@ 262 mg/dL, TRG 123 mg/dL, HDL 35 mg/dL, and LDL 202 mg/dL).

citations.NLM: Cham S, Koslik HJ, Golomb BA. Mood, Personality, and Behavior Changes During Treatment with Statins: A Case Series Drug Saf Case Rep. 2016 Dec;3(1):1. PMID: 27747681

results.title: Short-term reduction in bone markers with high-dose simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Short-term use of high-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ lowers the level of the serum bone marker bone-specific alkaline phosphatase, which suggests the possibility of @<m>DISEASE_Mental_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001523 @@@reduced bone turnover@@@.

citations.NLM: Rosenson RS, Tangney CC, Langman CB, Parker TS, Levine DM, Gordon BR. Short-term reduction in bone markers with high-dose simvastatin. Osteoporos Int. 2005 Oct;16(10):1272-6. PMID: 16088363
